21 #include <stdio.h>

24 
25 #define swap(a, b) { uint8_t t = a; a = b; b = t; }
26 
27 #define OLEDPWR 4 // 3.3V regulator enable
28 
29 // Port and bit mappings for DC, RESET, SS
30 // ** These are CPU dependent **
31 #define DCPORT PORTB
32 #define DCDDR DDRB
33 #define DCBIT 0
34 
35 #define RESETPORT PORTD
36 #define RESETDDR DDRD
37 #define RESETBIT 7
38 
39 #define SSPORT PORTB
40 #define SSDDR DDRB
41 #define SSBIT 2
42 
43 // Macros to quickly set DC, RESET, SS
44 // A HIGH sets the signal to input mode with the internal pullup enabled
45 #define DCHIGH ((DCPORT |= _BV(DCBIT)), (DCDDR &= ~_BV(DCBIT)))
46 #define DCLOW ((DCPORT &= ~_BV(DCBIT)), (DCDDR |= _BV(DCBIT)))
47 
48 #define RESETHIGH ((RESETPORT |= _BV(RESETBIT)), (RESETDDR &= ~_BV(RESETBIT)))
49 #define RESETLOW ((RESETPORT &= ~_BV(RESETBIT)), (RESETDDR |= _BV(RESETBIT)))
50 
51 #define SSHIGH ((SSPORT |= _BV(SSBIT)), (SSDDR &= ~_BV(SSBIT)))
52 #define SSLOW ((SSPORT &= ~_BV(SSBIT)), (SSDDR |= _BV(SSBIT)))
53 
54 // SCK, MOSI already defined by original pins_arduino.h
55 //#define SCK 13
56 //#define MOSI 11
57 
58 #define BLACK 0
59 #define WHITE 1
60 
61 #define LCDWIDTH 64
62 #define LCDHEIGHT 48
63 #define LCDPAGES (LCDHEIGHT / 8)
64 #define LCDCOLUMNOFFSET 32 // Visible start column within SSD1306 controller memory
65 
66 #define LCDTOTALWIDTH 128 // Full width of SSD1306 controller memory
67 #define LCDTOTALHEIGHT 64 // Full height of SSD1306 controller memory
68 #define LCDTOTALPAGES (LCDTOTALHEIGHT / 8)
69 
70 #define FONTHEADERSIZE 6
71 
72 #define NORM 0
73 #define XOR 1
74 
75 #define PAGE 0
76 #define ALL 1
77 
78 #define WIDGETSTYLE0 0
79 #define WIDGETSTYLE1 1
80 #define WIDGETSTYLE2 2
81 //Added for Vertical slider styles
82 #define WIDGETSTYLE3 3
83 
84 #define SETCONTRAST 0x81
85 #define DISPLAYALLONRESUME 0xA4
86 #define DISPLAYALLON 0xA5
87 #define NORMALDISPLAY 0xA6
88 #define INVERTDISPLAY 0xA7
89 #define DISPLAYOFF 0xAE
90 #define DISPLAYON 0xAF
91 #define SETDISPLAYOFFSET 0xD3
92 #define SETCOMPINS 0xDA
93 #define SETVCOMDESELECT 0xDB
94 #define SETDISPLAYCLOCKDIV 0xD5
95 #define SETPRECHARGE 0xD9
96 #define SETMULTIPLEX 0xA8
97 #define SETLOWCOLUMN 0x00
98 #define SETHIGHCOLUMN 0x10
99 #define SETPAGE 0xB0
100 #define SETADDRESSMODE 0x20
101 #define SETCOLUMNBOUNDS 0x21
102 #define SETPAGEBOUNDS 0x22
103 #define SETSTARTLINE 0x40
104 #define MEMORYMODE 0x20
105 #define COMSCANINC 0xC0
106 #define COMSCANDEC 0xC8
107 #define SEGREMAP 0xA0
108 #define CHARGEPUMP 0x8D
109 #define EXTERNALVCC 0x01
110 #define SWITCHCAPVCC 0x02
111 
112 // Scroll
113 #define ACTIVATESCROLL 0x2F
114 #define DEACTIVATESCROLL 0x2E
115 #define SETVERTICALSCROLLAREA 0xA3
116 #define RIGHTHORIZONTALSCROLL 0x26
117 #define LEFTHORIZONTALSCROLL 0x27
118 #define VERTICALRIGHTHORIZONTALSCROLL 0x29
119 #define VERTICALLEFTHORIZONTALSCROLL 0x2A
120 
121 typedef enum CMD {
122  CMD_CLEAR, //0
123  CMD_INVERT, //1
124  CMD_CONTRAST, //2
125  CMD_DISPLAY, //3
126  CMD_SETCURSOR, //4
127  CMD_PIXEL, //5
128  CMD_LINE, //6
129  CMD_LINEH, //7
130  CMD_LINEV, //8
131  CMD_RECT, //9
132  CMD_RECTFILL, //10
133  CMD_CIRCLE, //11
134  CMD_CIRCLEFILL, //12
135  CMD_DRAWCHAR, //13
136  CMD_DRAWBITMAP, //14
137  CMD_GETLCDWIDTH, //15
138  CMD_GETLCDHEIGHT, //16
139  CMD_SETCOLOR, //17
140  CMD_SETDRAWMODE //18
141 } commCommand_t;

180  void rect(uint8_t x, uint8_t y, uint8_t width, uint8_t height);

182  void rectFill(uint8_t x, uint8_t y, uint8_t width, uint8_t height);

188  void drawChar(uint8_t x, uint8_t y, uint8_t c);

197  // Font functions
198  uint8_t getFontWidth(void);

202  uint8_t setFontType(uint8_t type);
203  uint8_t getFontStartChar(void);
204  uint8_t getFontTotalChar(void);
205 
206  // LCD Rotate Scroll functions
207  void scrollRight(uint8_t start, uint8_t stop);
208  void scrollLeft(uint8_t start, uint8_t stop);

210  void scrollVertLeft(uint8_t start, uint8_t stop);
211  void scrollStop(void);
212  void flipVertical(boolean flip);
213  void flipHorizontal(boolean flip);
214 
215  // Communication
216  void checkComm(void);
217  void doCmd(uint8_t index);
218

221  uint16_t fontMapWidth;

245  virtual void draw(){};
247  virtual void drawFace(){};
248  void reDraw();

280 #define SPI_CLOCK_DIV4 0x00
281 #define SPI_CLOCK_DIV16 0x01
282 #define SPI_CLOCK_DIV64 0x02
283 #define SPI_CLOCK_DIV128 0x03
284 #define SPI_CLOCK_DIV2 0x04
285 #define SPI_CLOCK_DIV8 0x05
286 #define SPI_CLOCK_DIV32 0x06
287 //#define SPI_CLOCK_DIV64 0x07
288 
289 #define SPI_MODE0 0x00
290 #define SPI_MODE1 0x04
291 #define SPI_MODE2 0x08
292 #define SPI_MODE3 0x0C
293 
294 #define SPI_MODE_MASK 0x0C // CPOL = bit 3, CPHA = bit 2 on SPCR
295 #define SPI_CLOCK_MASK 0x03 // SPR1 = bit 1, SPR0 = bit 0 on SPCR
296 #define SPI_2XCLOCK_MASK 0x01 // SPI2X = bit 0 on SPSR
297 
298 class MVSPIClass {
299 public:
301  inline static void wait();
302 
304  inline static void transfer(byte _data);
305 
307  static void packetBegin();
308 
310  static void packetEnd();
311 
312  // SPI Configuration methods
313 
314  inline static void attachInterrupt();
315  inline static void detachInterrupt(); // Default
316 
317  static void begin(); // Default
318  static void end();
319 
320  static void setBitOrder(uint8_t);
321  static void setDataMode(uint8_t);
322  static void setClockDivider(uint8_t);
323 };
324 
325 extern MVSPIClass MVSPI;
326 
327 void MVSPIClass::wait() {
328  while (!(SPSR & _BV(SPIF)))
329  ;
330 }
331 
332 void MVSPIClass::transfer(byte _data) {
333  SPDR = _data;
334 }
335 
336 void MVSPIClass::attachInterrupt() {
337  SPCR |= _BV(SPIE);
338 }
339 
340 void MVSPIClass::detachInterrupt() {
341  SPCR &= ~_BV(SPIE);
342 }
